tools.description: Browser-based voiceover script generator with timing, delivery notes, and multiple voice style presets. Exports to TXT/JSON for recording sessions.

tools.name: Seedance 2.0
tools.description: ByteDance's AI video generation platform with native audio capabilities. 1080p output, camera motion controls, and Lip Sync feature for talking head videos.
tools.notes: Launched Feb 7, 2026. Called "strongest video generation model on Earth" by Black Myth: Wukong producer Feng Ji. Multi-modal control, 8+ language audio.

tools.name: Kling 3.0
tools.description: Kuaishou's advanced AI video generator with 1080p resolution, 10-second clips, and character consistency features. Strong motion quality and physics simulation.
tools.notes: Launched Feb 4, 2026. Native 4K @ 60fps. Storyboarding feature built-in. Competitive free tier.

tools.name: ViewStats Pro
tools.description: MrBeast's YouTube analytics platform for finding outlier videos. Identifies viral content patterns, channel performance metrics, and trending opportunities.

tools.name: Google Veo 3.1
tools.description: Google's AI video generator with native audio generation. Creates clips with synchronized sound effects and background audio. Strong motion quality and physics simulation.
tools.notes: 4K update pushed early Feb 2026. Beats Sora 2 on access, prompt adherence, and audio. Spatial audio support.

tools.name: OpenAI Sora 2
tools.description: OpenAI's latest video generation model with hyperreal motion and native audio. New dedicated app for video creation with improved physics and cinematic quality.
tools.notes: Launched Dec 31, 2025. Best for cinematic quality and human emotion rendering. Limited access vs Veo 3.1. Physics simulation strength.

tools.name: Runway Gen-4.5
tools.description: Runway's newest video generation model with unprecedented accuracy in motion and scene consistency. Enhanced character consistency and camera controls for professional workflows.
tools.notes: Continued benchmark dominance in Feb 2026. Best-in-class for creative control. Long-form up to 60s. $315M Series E at $5.3B valuation.

tools.name: Aethir
tools.description: Decentralized GPU cloud infrastructure for AI video generation and compute. Provides distributed workloads for real-time AI image/video generation with enterprise-grade reliability. Competes with traditional cloud for AI compute.

tools.name: Blockbuster Studio (BBS)
tools.description: Animation studio and content creation tool for Minecraft machinima. In-mod camera paths, keyframe animation, custom models.
tools.ecosystemNotes: BBS Reforge brings BBS to modern versions with dynamic lighting. Blockbuster mod bridges CustomNPCs with BBS models. Flashback captures live moments, BBS creates scripted scenes â€” different use cases.
